title: CC菜单怎么做啊？？
author: Monster_197
txt_content: 完全看不懂网上的辅助程序，到底该咋弄啊？

replies.author: tangxian
replies.txt_content:
打开
plugins/ChestCommands/menu/里面的example.yml文件
menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
  # Appears as the title of the menu.
  name: '&1神秘岛菜单 '        #菜单名字

  # REQUIRED
  # The number of rows in the menu.
  rows: 6                      #菜单行数最大为6

  # OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'cd'                #快捷指令

  # OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5

  # OPTIONAL
  # This command command will be executed when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: 'tell: &e你打开了神秘岛菜单.'

  # OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only when right-clicking with a compass.
  open-with-item:
    id: 444                        #快捷物品打开，物品开大下面是左键还是右键打开
    left-click: false
    right-click: true

spawncmd:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'          #点击执行的指令
  NAME: '&2主城'                   #显示名称
  LORE:                   #介绍
    - '&c去主城'

  ID: 505       #显示的ID
  POSITION-X: 5              #在菜单中的位子下面是y这里是x轴
  POSITION-Y: 1
